inclusion.criterion: Patients must be females with Turner's syndrome diagnosed by leukocyte karyotype
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronologic age greater than or equal to 5 years.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Prepubertal Tanner I status. If breast development is Tanner II or III, demonstration of castrate status through measurement of serum FSH (greater than 12 MIU/ML).
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: All patients must be below the 10th percentile for chronologic age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have at least 6 months accurate, growth measurements available for calculation of pre-study growth velocity. Pretreatment measurements must be obtained during a time when the patient is not receiving a potential growth-promoting agent.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients judged to be thyroxine deficient must have replacement which has resulted in normal thyroid function tests over the three-month period prior to enrollment (T4, T3, Thyroid Stimulating Hormone).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients and/or parents or legal guardians of patients must sign an informed consent statement. Assent should be obtained from all patients competent to understand the protocol.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have received any form of human growth hormone within the past 3 months, or who have received a cumulative course of therapy totaling greater than one year.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have received treatment with estrogen or androgen in the past three months or who have received a cumulative course of therapy totaling greater than one year.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have any Y component in their chromosome analysis.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a chronologic age greater than 12 years.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a bone age greater than 12 years.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is an obese, mentally retarded girl in the physical exam. Her breast bulb were in stage 1 with no course hair in the pubic or axillary.
